channel.title: Homes on Golang Malaysia
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Golang Malaysia

item.title: about
item.description:
Welcome

Most discussions are happening on the Facebook Group. The intention of this site is to collect knowledge sharing via blog posts.

Current Agenda

We’re trying to host a meetup at least once a month on the last Tuesday.

Community driven

Anybody can contribute to this site. Just check out and submit us your pull request.

The repository is at https://github.com/golang-my/golang-my.github.io-hugo.

How to contribute.

Telegram Group

Join our telegram group Golang Malaysia for discussions and latest updates on the meetups.
